name: Cube Critters
description:
Cube Critters is a voxel-powered adventure set in a beautiful cubic world. Guide your character through treacherous mazes, collect helpful power-ups, and avoid sneaky obstacles to capture the crown. You can also challenge other players worldwide or battle it out with Facebook friends; the competition will be fierce either way.

Key Features:
• Battle players worldwide through Facebook or over Wi-Fi.
• Conquer challenging mazes solo in single-player mode.
• Use a single finger to guide your character.
• Interact with your opponent by making use of props, obstacles, and emojis.
• Enjoy a vibrant 3D world with five unique environments.
• Collect gold coins to unlock new characters!

More Information:
